body:
Combines and supercedes
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/1510
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/1502

Makes all cluster shape computations inherit rechit cleaning from underlying cluster and consistently use rechit fractions, both for eNxM style quantities as well as covariance and localCovariance (sigIetaIeta etc).
title: Fixed shower shapes
